5524.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn and 
causes colossal damage to enemy

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!
Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Seductive Attack
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Chance of evading enemy's attack 
(including Super Attack) +30% for 1 turn and 
disables a single targeted enemy's action 
once within the turn
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when facing only 1 enemy, 
whose HP is 50% or more, or when all allies 
attacking in the same turn are Super Class 
"DB Saga" Category characters (once only)
